name: Project Z (RenasDev)
description:
[WIP] A prototype inspired by Resident Evil 4.

Follow development:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPPekjUD_0y3wjna1KdBh9Q

Controls - Keyboard

Game Controls

Controls - Dualshock controller

Move: Left stick

Camera: Right stick

Jump: Cross

Reload: R1

Iteract: Triangle

Change weapon: Square

Aim: L2

Shoot: R2 (While aiming)
